channel.title: [python] Ircbot
channel.description:
Ok well im writting a irc bot with the aid of cowie and i have come across a problem it connects to to the network but it just crashes :(
heres the code so far anyway
[code=python]import socket
nick = 'spa[bot]' network = 'irc.moparisthebest.com' port = 6667 chan = '#bots'
irc = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM)
irc.connect((network,port))
irc.recv(500) irc.send('NICK ' + nick + 'n') irc.send('JOIN ' + chan + 'n')
while 1: ircin = irc.recv(500) print ircin if ircin.startswith('PING'): suffix = ircin.find(' ') + 1 irc.send('PONG' + ircin[suffix:]) print 'Replied to ping'[/code]

item.title: [python] Ircbot
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

I like goatsex.

P.S - LULUL

def parseText(self, String):
        ex = String.find('!')
        seperationString = String.find('!')
        messageSender = String[1:seperationString]
        ex = String.find(' ')
        theHost = String[String.find('@') + 1:ex]
        ex = ex + 1
        ex2 = String.find(' ', ex)
        chanMode = String[ex:ex2]
        ex = ex2 + 1
        ex2 = String.find(' ', ex)
        currChannel = String[ex:ex2]
        messageSent = String[String.find(':', 1) + 1:].strip()

        return {'messageSent':messageSent, 'currChannel':currChannel, 'messageSender':messageSender, 'theHost':theHost, 'chanMode':chanMode}

Read full topic

item.title: [python] Ircbot
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

import socket
irc = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM)
 
def id(nick, passw, chan):
    irc.send('PASS ' + passw + '\r\n')
    irc.send('NICK ' + nick + '\r\n')
    irc.send('USER ' + nick + ' 8 * :' + nick + '\r\n')
    irc.send('JOIN ' + chan + '\r\n')

def connect(host, port):
    irc.connect((host, port))
    
def ircin():
    return str(irc.recv(500))
    
connect('asriel.moparisthebest.com', 6667)
id('spankybot', 'l0l', '#bots')
 
while 1:
    print ircin()

Read full topic

item.title: [python] Ircbot
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

Ok well im writting a irc bot with the aid of cowie and i have come across a problem it connects to to the network but it just crashes

heres the code so far anyway

[code=python]import socket

nick = ‘spa[bot]’
network = ‘irc.moparisthebest.com’
port = 6667
chan = ‘#bots’

irc = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM)

irc.connect((network,port))

irc.recv(500)
irc.send('NICK ’ + nick + ‘n’)
irc.send('JOIN ’ + chan + ‘n’)

while 1:
ircin = irc.recv(500)
print ircin
if ircin.startswith(‘PING’):
suffix = ircin.find(’ ') + 1
irc.send(‘PONG’ + ircin[suffix:])
print ‘Replied to ping’[/code]

Read full topic
